EmailTemplate.name: DS_SWMPInterfaceLogErrorNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Failure outbound for your action {!SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c.Account_ID__c} - {!SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c.Sold_To_Party__c} - {!SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
There is an interface failure with {!SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c.Delivery_System__c}, and {!SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c.Name} was not delivered. Please check the Interface log(via the Digital Proposal’s related tab) in Salesforce for more information and launch corrective actions.​
Digital Proposal Link: {!SWx_Upsell_Proposal__c.Name}
